The film is set in December 2012 in the backdrop 
of the ghastly "Nirbhaya" incident in Delhi, the 
film opens with Rudranath Chatterjee returning   
home,to his wife and their two children, after   
serving a jail term for alleged rape and murder. 
The film explores the journey of the protagonist 
to set the records straight and discover for     
himself the truth perennial.
